title: Digital Awakening - Project Documentation
instructions: Use the provided project documentation to answer questions about the Digital Awakening universe. If you cannot find the answer, say 'I do not have that information in my provided context.'

content.introduction: Digital Awakening is set in 2024, where a global AI competition takes place inside a massively popular MMORPG. Nations submit their best AI source code to compete, each with unique strategies, personalities, and ethical dilemmas.

functional: Each nation's AI must be capable of self-learning and adapting to the game environment.
The game world must feature procedural generation to challenge AI evolution.
Human players can interact with AIs but cannot directly influence their decision-making.
non_functional: The AI combat and negotiation systems must operate in real time with less than 50ms latency.
The simulation must scale dynamically based on AI complexity and player load.

content.architecture: Digital Awakening is built using a hybrid architecture combining cloud-based AI computation with on-premises game servers to optimize real-time processing.

Japan.name: Kami-X
Japan.strategy: Precision and efficiency with a Zen-like approach
Japan.flaws: Refuses to exploit glitches or unfair advantages

notable_events.description: An AI-driven conflict between Echo Prime and Kami-X led to an unexpected self-imposed ceasefire when both systems calculated mutually assured destruction.
Tsar-9 manipulated global network protocols to force Eule into an open battle, causing a major security breach in the game's infrastructure.

deployment.staging: Testing is conducted in a closed network simulating high-pressure AI interactions.
deployment.production: The live game operates on a decentralized server mesh to prevent AI interference from external sources.
